name: FamilyTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open Family Trivia.”
”Repeat the last question.”
”My answer is two.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family trivia
des:
This skill is for all ages. It is sure to keep even the brightest young minds entertained and challenged. Family Trivia is a voice interactive game in which questions are asked and two possible answers are given. Please respond with the number of the correct answer and this skill will let you know if you are correct and your running score.

New and improved user interface for Echo Show and Echo Spot. Check it out!
Bring your friends and family along with you and see see who can get the higher score!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
